TrcFtcLib.ftclib

Class FtcMotorActuator.Parameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcFtcLib.ftclib.FtcMotorActuator.Parameters
  • Enclosing class:
    FtcMotorActuator

    public static class FtcMotorActuator.Parameters
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the parameters related to the motor actuator.

        public Parameters()

    • Method Detail

      • setPosRange

        public FtcMotorActuator.Parameters setPosRange(double minPos,
                                               double maxPos)
        This method sets the position range limits of the motor actuator.
        Parameters:
        minPos - specifies the minimum position of the actuator in scaled unit.
        maxPos - specifies the maximum position of the actuator in scaled unit.
        Returns:
        this parameter object.

      • setScaleOffset

        public FtcMotorActuator.Parameters setScaleOffset(double scale,
                                                  double offset)
        This method sets the scale and offset of the motor actuator. It allows the actuator to report real world position units such as inches or degrees instead of sensor units.
        Parameters:
        scale - specifies the scale multiplier to convert position sensor unit to real world unit.
        offset - specifies the offset value to add to the scaled real world unit.
        Returns:
        this parameter object.

      • setPidParams

        public FtcMotorActuator.Parameters setPidParams(double kP,
                                                double kI,
                                                double kD,
                                                double tolerance)
        This method sets the PID parameters of the PID controller used for PID controlling the motor actuator.
        Parameters:
        kP - specifies the Proportional constant.
        kI - specifies the Integral constant.
        kD - specifies the Differential constant.
        tolerance - specifies the tolerance in scaled unit.
        Returns:
        this parameter object.

      • setMotorParams

        public FtcMotorActuator.Parameters setMotorParams(boolean motorInverted,
                                                  boolean hasLowerLimitSwitch,
                                                  boolean lowerLimitInverted,
                                                  boolean hasUpperLimitSwitch,
                                                  boolean upperLimitInverted,
                                                  double calPower)
        This method sets the motor parameters of the motor actuator.
        Parameters:
        motorInverted - specifies true if the motor direction should be reverse, false otherwise.
        hasLowerLimitSwitch - specifies true if it has a lower limit switch, false otherwise.
        lowerLimitInverted - specifies true if lower limit switch is inverted, false otherwise.
        hasUpperLimitSwitch - specifies true if it has an upper limit switch, false otherwise.
        upperLimitInverted - specifies true if upper limit switch is inverted, false otherwise.
        calPower - specifies the motor power to use for zero calibration.
        Returns:
        this parameter object.

      • setStallProtectionParams

        public FtcMotorActuator.Parameters setStallProtectionParams(double stallMinPower,
                                                            double stallTimeout,
                                                            double resetTimeout)
        This method sets the stall protection parameters of the motor actuator.
        Parameters:
        stallMinPower - specifies the minimum power applied to the motor before stall detection will kick in.
        stallTimeout - specifies the minimum time the motor has to stall to trigger the stalled condition.
        resetTimeout - specifies the minimum time has to pass with no power applied to the motor to reset stalled condition.
        Returns:
        this parameter object.

      • setPosPresets

        public FtcMotorActuator.Parameters setPosPresets(double... posPresets)
        This method sets an array of preset positions for the motor actuator.
        Parameters:
        posPresets - specifies an array of preset positions in scaled unit.
        Returns:
        this parameter object.

      • setPowerCompensation

        public FtcMotorActuator.Parameters setPowerCompensation(TrcPidMotor.PowerCompensation powerCompensation)
        This method sets the power compensation callback method. When specified, the power compensation method will be called periodically to calculate the motor power to compensation for gravity.
        Parameters:
        powerCompensation - specifies the motor power compensation method.
        Returns:
        this parameter object.
